entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
